text: Bannio Anzino is a comune (municipality) in the Province of Verbano-Cusio- Ossola in the Italian region Piedmont. It is about northeast of Turin and about west of Verbania. Bannio Anzino is next to these municipalities: Calasca-Castiglione, Carcoforo, Ceppo Morelli, Fobello, Rimella, Vanzone con San Carlo. == References == Category:Settlements in Verbano-Cusio-Ossola
title: Bannio Anzino
